title: Three MPs withdraw support to govt.
body_lines: Three MPs Faizal Cassim, M. S. Thowfeek and Ishak Rahuman have refrained from supporting the government, MP Faizal Cassim said today.
He told Parliament that the three Parliamentarians would no longer support the government in future.
The above three Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) MPs extended their support to the government to pass the 20th Amendment and worked with the government since then.
